org.mt4j.input.inputData
Class AbstractCursorInputEvt

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.input.MTEvent
      org.mt4j.input.inputData.MTInputEvent
          org.mt4j.input.inputData.AbstractCursorInputEvt
Direct Known Subclasses:
MTFiducialInputEvt, MTFingerInputEvt
public abstract class AbstractCursorInputEvt
extends MTInputEvent

This event class is used for input events that have position data associated with them. This applies for mouse input, finger or fiducial input for example. Also associated with this event is a InputMotion object, which contains information about the input over time and is a container for all input events during this time.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

preFire

public void preFire()
This method should be called before firing this event to the global input processors. Here, the event is added to its cursor.
